# Sander Lamballais

```{r echo = FALSE, out.width = '60%'}
knitr::include_graphics("data/slamballais.jpeg")
```

Sander Lamballais is a PhD candidate finalizing his thesis and recently started as a postdoctoral researcher at the Erasmus MC in Rotterdam, the Netherlands. His work has primarily focused on neuroimaging across the lifespan. His currents projects focus on genetic methodology and how to apply new methods to neurogenetics.

# Ryan Muetzel

```{r echo = FALSE, out.width = '60%'}
knitr::include_graphics("data/rmuetzel.jpg")
```

Ryan Muetzel is an assistant professor at the Erasmus MC in Rotterdam, the Netherlands. He obtained his PhD degree in 2016, for his thesis titled [The Connections Within: Pediatric population-based neuroimaging of brain development](https://www.generationr.nl/wp-content/uploads/2017/03/Proefschrift-Muetzel.compressed.pdf). He has (co-)authored [over 60 papers](https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/?term=Muetzel%20RL%5BAuthor%5D&cauthor=true&cauthor_uid=31085031).
